commit.message:
i386.c (i386_valid_type_attribute_p): Return nonzero for mismatched "stdcall" and "cdecl" attributes.

        * i386.c (i386_valid_type_attribute_p): Return nonzero for mismatched
        "stdcall" and "cdecl" attributes.
